README:
This repository contains the LaTeX source code (and related files) for
my academic papers.  It is unlikely to be useful to anyone but me and
my coauthors.

PDF versions of these papers are available at my webpage:
   http://cg.scs.carleton.ca/~morin/publications/

Some of these papers are also available on the arXiv:
   http://arxiv.org/find/all/1/all:+EXACT+pat_morin/0/1/0/all/0/1
description: A repository for my research papers
